titleStmt.title: An elegy on the death of His Sacred Majesty, King Charles the II of blessed memory.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Millet, for W. Thackeray, at the sign of the Angel in Duck-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Unwelcome news! White-Hall it's sable wears ..."
At end of text: "Entred according to order."
Within mourning borders, with emblems and motto.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Angel in Duck-Lane
